snippet.title: Pipsqueak! Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pipsqueakgame/pipsqueak

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2741550/Pipsqueak/

Announcing Pipsqueak! A search-action platformer starring a small mouse named Tofu - currently in development by us at Pond Games.
